title: Jennifer Aniston follows ex husband Justin Theroux on social media but he is yet to follow back

Jennifer Aniston has chosen to follow her ex husband Justin Theroux on her brand new Instagram account.

The actress, 50, who made her social media debut on Tuesday with a selfie snap of with her Friends castmates, has selected her former flame as one of the accounts she can scroll through on the app.

Justin, 48, who boasts 708,000 followers on the picture site, is yet to return the favour and follow his ex wife.

As a newcomer to Instagram Jennifer is only currently following 83 people but she already has a massive 209,000 fans waiting to see what her next offering is.

Jennifer and Justin ended their marriage in 2017 after tying the knot in 2015 at their Bel Air home after three years of engagement.

In a joint statement, the couple said shared the sad news of the end of their marriage.

(Image: Getty Images)

They penned: "We have decided to announce our separation.

"This decision was mutual and lovingly made at the end of last year."

They added that they would have handled their separation privately, but they wanted to counter speculation and "convey the truth directly".

Jennifer fell for Justin, cousin of film-maker Louis Theroux, in 2011 when they were co-stars filming rom-com Wanderlust.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Blonde beauty Jennifer is unable to follow her first husband Brad Pitt, who she divorced in 2005, as he does not use the social media site.

The Murder Mystery star ensured she joined the picture site with a bang by posting the first ever Instagram snap of the main cast members of Friends reunited.

The happy snap showed Jennifer, best known for her role of Rachel Green in the American sitcom, smiling alongside her Friends co-stars David Schwimmer, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, Matt LeBlanc and Matthew Perry.

(Image: Instagram)

Fans of the took to the comments to share their excitement of her joining the social media site.

One penned: "I love this so much" alongside a crying face.

Another added: "This is a moment!."

Some gushed: "our besties all together!!!!!" and "Oh yeah mama!! Woooohooooo."
description: The actress, who made her social media debut on Tuesday, is following her former husband Justin Theroux - but he is not following her
